column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The recommended pizza was the Malnato Chicago Classic deep dish which I thought was very hearty and a delight to eat but felt like it feel short of delivering that "wow" factor. I just think with most deep dish pizzas
column2: it's difficult for each of the ingredients to be tasted because it is muddled with all the cheese and tomato sauce. But don't get me wrong
column3: the pizza was not unappetizing or tasteless -- it just wasn't my type of pizza. Probably out of the few places I have tried a deep dish pizza
column4: Lou Malnati's was the best one.
